sentences.sContent: The succubus is the female counterpart of the incubus. She is a demon seductress who preys on sleeping men, draining them of their “vitality.”
sentences.sContent_eng: The succubus is the female counterpart of the incubus. She is a demon seductress who preys on sleeping men, draining them of their “vitality.”
sentences.sCn: 女淫妖与男淫妖相对应，指的是一种以入睡男子为猎物，吸收他们精元的妖魔。

trans.tranCn: 女妖, 妓女, 魔鬼
trans.tranOther: a female devil that in the past was believed to have sex with a sleeping man
